text: A woman in Ireland demonstrated a helpful way to explain the importance of washing your hands to kids by doing an experiment that shows how quickly black pepper particles acting as a virus coronavirus move away as soon as the child has soap on his hands. https://t.co/u7P4KL3Wt4 https://t.co/zDfRE6Npea
